Title: This review might be helpful for you.
Review Content: I recently purchased the ZEBRONICS Zeb-Blitz headphone and I am really impressed with its overall performance. Firstly, I would like to mention that I received the product much earlier than expected. I placed the order on 29th April 2023 and the estimated delivery date was 3rd May 2023. However, to my surprise, I received the product on 1st May 2023 itself. Kudos to the seller for delivering it earlier than expected.Coming to the headphone, I must say it looks really cool with its RGB lighting. Also you can turn off RGB lighting when it's not necessary.  The sound quality is simply outstanding. As a gamer, I play a lot of PC games and the audio quality of this headphone just enhances the overall gaming experience. The sound is crystal clear and the bass is really impressive. It is an absolute banger in terms of sound quality. It's mic is abit short in size but it's flexible. If you want to use this headphone with your mobile then you have to get an otg cable because this headphone has USB cable not 3.5 mm jack :( .However, one thing I would like to mention is that the headphone weighs around 370 grams which might make it uncomfortable for some people, especially for those who are not used to it. For me, as a new user, it feels like it's holding my ear very tight. But I am hoping that with regular use, I will get used to it and it will become more comfortable.Overall, I am really satisfied with my purchase and I would definitely recommend this headphone to anyone who is looking for a quality headphone. Lastly, I would like to mention that the product was dispatched from Bangalore which is why I received it so quickly. Thank you for reading my review.

Title: Total value for money..
Review Content: Over 2 years still working great but have to say it's only because of Dolby.. with Dolby and some eq tweaks sound becomes 3x better.. movies, music all good üëç and surround sound works great for the price.. tested in warzone, apex,marvel rivals, and even in story games.. highly recommended!! But I will say it can be heavy/bulky for some!!

Title: Just go for it !
Review Content: Well, this is only my second headphone. I had been using Redgear Cosmo 7.1 previously. So I'll be comparing this to Cosmo 7.1. Well I was actually intending to buy Redgear Cosmo 7.1 again but unfortunately it was out of stock for too long. Then I found this headphone and I was not planning to buy it initially. But Red gear Cosmo 7.1 was not gonna back in stock  anytime soon.So I was forced to buy it. Thank God cause now I got a better one.This is just perfect.Music experience: 10/10. (My previous headphone was a gaming beast but it wasn't good for music.)Gaming experience: 10/10. ( Make sure you enable Dolby Atmos)Light weight and comfortable ( Well I saw a lot of people complaining about the build quality of the product.But  it is not that bad as they say. they have made a significant effort to make the product lightweight. In that case the quality of the product is satisfactory. But watch out for scratches and dents.)I also saw a lot of people saying that they weren't able to enable the Dolby Atmos feature.Let me help you with that as well. First of all there is no product activation key for the Dolby Atmos app within the package. You don't have to activate Dolby Atmos app in order to use the Dolby Atmos feature.‚ñ™Ô∏èJust plug in your headphone‚ñ™Ô∏èInstall the Dolby Atmos app from the Microsoft store (You don't even have to open it)‚ñ™Ô∏è Now go to the taskbar, select the sound options where you have to choose your audio device. Select the Zeb Blitz headphone. Below this option you could find the option to enable Dolby Atmos feature.Simple as that. If you want to change the equalizer settings ,just head to the Dolby Atmos app, go to the settings option and adjust the settings as per your requirement.(No need to create account or buy subscription) And the best part is that it is free for lifetime.(Obviously the headphone's lifetime üòÖ) But I am pretty sure that it will be okay for at least 2-3 years. I will update my review if any problem occurs.But anyway I will recommend it to anyone who just wanna play games and wanna enjoy music at the same time.Just go for it.Mic quality is just ok.But I actually faced an issue with the package. The box was not even wrapped in paper. They pasted the tag on top of the box and send it to me and the seal was broken.First time it happened with Amazon. I had such experiences earlier with Flipkart. I have boughtmany products from this seller and I even got a cardboard box for a splitter worth 200/- but no packing for for a product worth 2000/-.So watchout for that.

Title: Zeb Blitz ( Things you need to know )
Review Content: Sound Quality (without Dolby Atmos) :: 4/5 üëçSound Quality (with Dolby Atmos) :: couldn't check due to update issue in laptop. üòîGaming :: 4.2/5 ( played warzone, Apex legends; enemy movement detected easily üëå‚ú®‚ú®)Facts:-** Headset is slight heavy than other headset at this price point.So make sure to take breaks in LONG TIME USE üôÇ.** earcups are big, really big üò≥** Noise cancellation is good ( fan was at full speed, yet there was very low sound while wearing headset üëå)** Be sure to download DOLBY ACCESS app from Microsoft Store to activate Dolby Atmos enhancement for your headset.** I bought it at 1700/-, So in this price point this headset is definitely better choice (For casual gamers üéÆ and music lovers üéµ)** gold plated USB, so make sure to take extra care while travelling outside with it üòèüòè.** If you don't like RGB lighting in the headset, you can turn it off by pressing üí° button 6 times on the controller ( Image No. 5 ) üòâ
